CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed"), NOT(ISBLANK(Resolution_Time__c)) ),
/* --- Calculate Time Only When Resolution_Time__c is Present --- */ IF( (Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 86400 < 60, TEXT(ROUND((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 86400, 0)) & " seconds",
IF( (Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 1440 < 60, TEXT(FLOOR((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 1440)) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds",
IF( (Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 24 < 24, TEXT(FLOOR((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 24)) & " hours " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 1440, 60))) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds",
TEXT(FLOOR((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate))) & " days " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 24, 24))) & " hours " & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 1440, 60))) & " minutes " & TEXT(ROUND(MOD((Resolution_Time__c - CreatedDate) * 86400, 60), 0)) & " seconds" ) ) ),
"" /* Return blank if status â‰ Closed OR Resolution_Time__c is blank */ )
CustomField.label: Resolution TAT
